  • Classes in org.cpsolver.coursett.constraint used by org.cpsolver.coursett.constraint 
    Class and Description
    FlexibleConstraint
    Flexible constraint.
    FlexibleConstraint.Block
    A block is a list of placements sorted by startSlot, which are BTB.
    FlexibleConstraint.FlexibleConstraintContext 
    FlexibleConstraint.FlexibleConstraintType
    Flexible constraint types
    GroupConstraint
    Group constraint.
    GroupConstraint.AssignmentPairCheck
    Group constraints that can be checked on pairs of classes (e.g., same room means any two classes are in the same room), only need to implement this interface.
    GroupConstraint.ConstraintType
    Group constraint type.
    GroupConstraint.ConstraintTypeInterface
    Constraint type interface
    GroupConstraint.Flag
    Group constraint building blocks (individual constraints that need more than GroupConstraint.PairCheck)
    GroupConstraint.GroupConstraintContext 
    GroupConstraint.ParametrizedConstraintType
    Constraint type with a parameter
    InstructorConstraint
    Instructor constraint.
    InstructorConstraint.InstructorConstraintContext 
    JenrlConstraint.JenrlConstraintContext 
    MinimizeNumberOfUsedGroupsOfTime.MinimizeNumberOfUsedGroupsOfTimeContext 
    MinimizeNumberOfUsedRoomsConstraint.MinimizeNumberOfUsedRoomsConstraintContext 
    RoomConstraint
    Room constraint.
    RoomConstraint.RoomConstraintContext 
    SpreadConstraint
    Spread given set of classes in time as much as possible.
    SpreadConstraint.SpreadConstraintContext
